comment.text: The "RoleForLink" translation key is used to display a brief description explaining how roles relate to links in an editing panel. It is typically displayed as a label or title and appears in the UI when editing link roles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'الدور للرابط' literally translates to 'The role for the link'. While understandable, a more natural and contextually appropriate translation for 'Role for link' (likely referring to a role assigned to a link) might be 'دور الرابط' (Role of the link) or 'دور مرتبط بالرابط' (Role associated with the link).

The translation '링크에 대한 역할' is technically correct but sounds a bit formal and stiff for a UI element like 'Role for link'. It doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of a designated role or permission related to a link.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '링크 역할' (Link Role) or '링크 권한' (Link Permission) for a more natural and concise translation, depending on the specific context of 'Role'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Rol pentru link-ul' is not the most natural Romanian translation for 'Role for link'. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky. 'Rol pentru legătură' is a better option.

The translation "මුද්දරයක් සඳහා භූමිකාව" (muddayak sarata bhoomikava) literally translates to "Role for a stamp". The English term 'link' refers to a hyperlink, not a stamp. The translation doesn't convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would depend on the specific context. Possible suggestions include: 'සබැඳිය සඳහා භූමිකාව' (sabandiya sarata bhoomikava - Role for a link), or 'සංදේශය සඳහා භූමිකාව' (sandesa sarata bhoomikava - Role for a message/reference).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Улога за линк" is technically a translation, it's not the most natural or idiomatic Serbian (Cyrillic) phrasing for "Role for link". "Улога за везу" would be more common and accurate, as 'link' is often translated as 'veza' in this context.

The translation 'Uloga za link' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Role for link'. 'Uloga' typically means 'role' or 'part' in a theatrical or film context. A more accurate translation would be 'Uloga vezana za link' or 'Namjena za link' depending on the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Uloga vezana za link' or 'Namjena za link'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "链接的权限" is technically correct but might be too formal or literal for a user interface element. "链接的权限" translates to 'Permissions for the link'. A more natural phrasing might be '链接角色' (Link Role) or '链接访问权限' (Link Access Permission).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '链接角色' or '链接访问权限' for a more natural feel. Context is important to determine the best alternative.
